EmailTemplate.name: New BA Support Query Request Tempate
EmailTemplate.subject: IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - New BA Support Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject Line Asset Class In the subject line state the asset class, one of Rates, Equities, Credit, Operations or Cross Asset.
Product State which product (or asset class) the query relates to. If it is for multiple asset classes, use 'Cross-Asset'
Workflow The workflow that the issue relates to. For example: New trade, Amendment, Clearing, PB, Novation etc
Environment Which environment the issue was encountered in: UAT, Training or production.
Client Which client reported the issue.
Summary Briefly summarise the issue
Steps Taken Detail the steps taken so far to investigate the issue. Mention which docs you have referred to (i.e. external mapping specs, product annexes, MCAs etc) Mention if anyone else has been involved with the investigation, i.e. Application Support. If you were not able to investigate, you need to state why that is the case.
